automig:dump.description: Dump data in Salesforce org to CSV files, for migration usage

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: output directory of dumped CSV files

automig:load.description: Load data from CSV files in directory to Salesforce org to CSV files

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

mappingobjects.name: mappingobjects
mappingobjects.description: list of object and key field pair to map to existing records
